languages.text: {n}Маражай убирает выбившуюся прядь со лба и плотоядно улыбается.{/n} "Что ж, {name}. Я развлекся на славу. Залижи раны как следует, прежде чем звать меня снова".
{n}Marazhai pushes back a strand of hair from his face, and his lips curl into a cruel smile.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай убирает выбившуюся прядь со лба и плотоядно улыбается.{/n} "Что ж, {name}. Я развлекся на славу. Залижи раны как следует, прежде чем звать меня снова".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai brushes away a strand of hair and leers ravenously.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai écarte une mèche de cheveux tombée sur son visage et un sourire cruel étire ses lèvres.{/n} « Bien, {name}, je me suis suffisamment amusé. Pansez bien vos plaies avant de me rappeler. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pushes back a strand of hair from his face, and his lips curl into a cruel smile.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai écarte une mèche de cheveux tombée sur son visage et un sourire cruel étire ses lèvres.{/n} « Bien, {name}, je me suis suffisamment amusé. Pansez bien vos plaies avant de me rappeler. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai aparta un mechón de pelo de su rostro y sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa cruel.{/n} «Bueno, {name}, yo me he divertido. Lámete bien esas heridas antes de volver a llamarme».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pushes back a strand of hair from his face, and his lips curl into a cruel smile.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai aparta un mechón de pelo de su rostro y sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa cruel.{/n} «Bueno, {name}, yo me he divertido. Lámete bien esas heridas antes de volver a llamarme».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋将脸上的头发往后一捋，嘴角露出了残忍的微笑。{/n}“很好，{name}，我玩得很开心。好好舔舐你的伤口，下次再找我吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pushes back a strand of hair from his face, and his lips curl into a cruel smile.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋将脸上的头发往后一捋，嘴角露出了残忍的微笑。{/n}“很好，{name}，我玩得很开心。好好舔舐你的伤口，下次再找我吧。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは顔に落ちた髪をうしろに持って行った。唇では笑顔を作っていた。{/n}「よい。{name}楽しかった。また私を呼ぶまでに、傷をよくなめておきなさい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pushes back a strand of hair from his face, and his lips curl into a cruel smile.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは顔に落ちた髪をうしろに持って行った。唇では笑顔を作っていた。{/n}「よい。{name}楽しかった。また私を呼ぶまでに、傷をよくなめておきなさい」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schiebt sich eine Haarsträhne aus dem Gesicht, und seine Lippen verziehen sich zu einem grausamen Lächeln.{/n} "Nun, {name}. Ich habe mich genug amüsiert. Leckt Euch Eure Wunden gut, ehe Ihr mich erneut ruft."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pushes back a strand of hair from his face, and his lips curl into a cruel smile.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schiebt sich eine Haarsträhne aus dem Gesicht, und seine Lippen verziehen sich zu einem grausamen Lächeln.{/n} "Nun, {name}. Ich habe mich genug amüsiert. Leckt Euch Eure Wunden gut, ehe Ihr mich erneut ruft."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yüzüne düşen saç telini geriye itiyor ve dudakları kıvrılıp gaddar bir gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ {name}. Ben yeterince eğlendim. Beni tekrar çağırmadan önce yaralarını tedavi et."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai pushes back a strand of hair from his face, and his lips curl into a cruel smile.{/n} "Well, {name}. I have had my fill of fun. Lick your wounds well before summoning me again."
